anya-e0105n0:2_0: Visuddhimaggo nāmāyaṁ gantho piṭakattayasārabhūto sakalaloke paṭipattidīpakaganthānaṁ
anya-e0105n0:2_1: aggo hoti seṭṭho pamukho pāmokkho uttamo pavaro cāti viññūhi pasattho. Tattha hi
anya-e0105n0:2_3: brahmacariyaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ pakāsitaṁ suvisadañca. Evaṁ pasatthassetassa visuddhimaggassa
anya-e0105n0:2_4: nidānakathāyapi bhavitabbameva. Tasmādāni tampakāsanatthamidaṁ pañhakammaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0105n0:3: “So panesa visuddhimaggo kena kato, kadā kato, kattha kato, kasmā kato, kimatthaṁ kato, kiṁ nissāya kato, kena pakārena kato, kissa sakalaloke patthaṭo”ti.
anya-e0105n0:4: Tattha kena katoti ācariyabuddhaghosattheravarena tepiṭakasaṅgahaṭṭhakathākārena kato.
anya-e0105n0:5: Kadā katoti amhākaṁ bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa sakalalokanāthassa parinibbutikālato pacchā dasame vassasatake (973 -buddhavasse) kato.
anya-e0105n0:6: Kattha katoti sīhaḷadīpe anurādhapure mahāvihāre kato.
anya-e0105n0:7: Kasmā katoti visuddhikāmānaṁ sādhujanānaṁ tadadhigamupāyaṁ sammāpaṭipattinayaṁ ñāpetukāmatāsaṅkhātena attano ajjhāsayena sañcoditattā, saṅghapālattherena ca ajjhesitattā kato.
anya-e0105n0:8_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa uppatti kathetabbā, sā ca mahāvaṁse
anya-e0105n0:24: “Gadrabhānaṁ rave atthaṁ, kiṁ jānāsī”ti āha taṁ.
anya-e0105n0:26: “Ahaṁ jāne”ti vutto so, otāresi sakaṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0105n0:27: Puṭṭhaṁ puṭṭhaṁ viyākāsi, viraddhampi ca dassayi.
anya-e0105n0:36: Ekāyano ayaṁ maggo, iti pacchā ta’maggahi.
anya-e0105n0:39: Buddhaghosoti ghoso hi, buddho viya mahītale.
anya-e0105n0:41: Tattha ñāṇodayaṁñāṇodayaṁ nāmapakaraṇaṁ idāni kuhiñcipi na dissati; nāma, katvā pakaraṇaṁ tadā;
anya-e0105n0:42: Dhammasaṅgaṇiyākāsi, kacchaṁ so aṭṭhasāliniṁidāni dissamānā pana aṭṭhasālinī sīhaḷadīpikāyeva; na jambudīpikā; parato (54-55 piṭṭhesu) esa āvibhavissati.
anya-e0105n0:44: Parittaṭṭhakathañceva parittaṭṭhakathanti piṭakattayassa saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanābhūtā khuddakaṭṭhakathāti adhippetā bhavesu, kātuṁ ārabhi buddhimā;
anya-e0105n0:45: Taṁ disvā revato thero, idaṁ vacanamabravi.
anya-e0105n0:47_0: “Pāḷimattaṁ idhānītaṁ, natthi aṭṭhakathā idha ettha sagībhittayārūḷhā moggaliputtatissattherassa
anya-e0105n0:47_1: santikā uggahitā sissānusissaparamparātatā mūlaṭṭhakathā kasmā jambudīpe sabbaso
anya-e0105n0:56: Taṁ tattha gantvā sutvā tvaṁ, māgadhānaṁ niruttiyā;
anya-e0105n0:59: Evaṁ vutte pasanno so, nikkhamitvā tato imaṁ;
anya-e0105n0:60_0: Dīpaṁ āgā imasseva idassevāti imasseva mahānāmarañño kāle 953-975 buddhavasse; ayañca
anya-e0105n0:60_1: vassaparicchedo sīhaḷarājavaṁsaṁ nissāya dassito; yuropiyavicakkhaṇānaṁ pana matena
anya-e0105n0:60_2: 941-964 buddhavasse iti veditabbo; evamuparipi;, rañño kāle mahāmati.
anya-e0105n0:69: Potthake detha sabbe”ti, āha, vīmaṁsituṁ sa taṁ.
anya-e0105n0:72_0: Ettha dassehi, taṁ disvā, sabbe demāti potthake” 234-5 gāthāsu ayamatthayojanā– “tattha
anya-e0105n0:72_1: mahāvihāre saṁghaṁ mahānetvā saṁgha sannipātaṁ kāretvā ācariyapubbaddhaghoso evamāha
anya-e0105n0:72_2: ‘aṭṭhakathaṁ kātuṁ sabbe pāḷi-aṭṭhakathā-potthake mama dethā’ti; so saṁgho taṁ vīmaṁsituṁ
anya-e0105n0:72_4: tassa adāsi ‘ettha tava sāmatthiyaṁ ñāṇappabhāvaṁ dasseti; taṁ disvā sabbe potthake
anya-e0105n0:72_5: demā’tivatvā”ti; iminā pana ayamatthā dassito hoti “ācariya buddhaghoso visuddhimaggaṁ
anya-e0105n0:72_6: karonto tadeva gāthādvayaṁ oloketvā, kiñcipi aññaṁ potthakaṁ anoloketvā akāsī”ti;
anya-e0105n0:81_0: Chādesuṁ potthakaṁ sopi, dvattikkhattumpi taṁ akā 238 gāthāya ayamattho– “devatā
anya-e0105n0:81_1: tassa buddhaghosassa nepuññaṁ nipuṇaññāppasāvaṁ mahājanassa pakāsetuṁ tena likhitaṁ
anya-e0105n0:81_2: visuddhimaggapotthakaṁ chādesuṁ paṭicchādetvā apassiyabhāvaṁ pāpetvā ṭhapesuṁ; sopi
anya-e0105n0:81_3: buddhaghoso dutiyampi taṁ likhi, tampi devatā chadesuṁ; tatiyampi likhī”ti; tena
anya-e0105n0:81_4: vuttaṁ “dvattikkhattumpi taṁ akā”ti; idameva mahāvaṁsavacanaṁ nissāya vittāretvā
anya-e0105n0:81_5: kathitāya buddhaghosuppattiyā nāma kathāla ekaratteneva visuddhimaggassa tikkhattumpi
anya-e0105n0:81_6: likhitvā niṭṭhāpitabhāvo pakāsito; īdisī pana kathā bahūnaṁ vimhayajananīpi parikkhakānaṁ
anya-e0105n0:81_7: saṁsayajananī hoti; tasmā imissāpi vicāraṇā parato (47-8-piṭṭhesu) dassiyissati.
anya-e0105n0:105_0: Vandituṁ so mahābodhiṁ, jambudīpaṁ upāgamī”ti so mahābodhi vandituṁ jambudīpaṁ upāgamīti
anya-e0105n0:105_1: idaṁ vacanaṁ purimavacanehi asaṁsaṭṭhaṁ viya hoti; pubbe hi “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe
anya-e0105n0:105_2: jāto”ti ca, “sīhaḷadīpaṁ gantvā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo māgadhabhāsāya parivattehīti tassācariyena
anya-e0105n0:105_3: revatattherena vutto”ti ca vuttaṁ; tasmā idhāpi ācariyabuddhaghosassa pavatti tadanurūpā
anya-e0105n0:105_4: “tā bhāsāparivattitaṭṭhakathāyo ādāya sāsanujjotanatthaṁ jambudīpaṁ upāgamī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0105n0:105_5: sāsanujjotanamūlikā eva bhavituṁ arahati, na pana mahābodhivandanamūlikāti.
anya-e0105n0:106_0: Ayañca pana mahāvaṁsakathā 1950 - kharistavasse hābadamahāvijjālayamuddaṇayante romakkharena
anya-e0105n0:106_2: vatvā dhammānandakosambīnāmakena vicakkhaṇena vicāritā. Tamettha yuttāyuttavicinanāya
